properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Tennessee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tennessee River at Perryville
* until further notice.
* At 1 AM Wednesday the stage was 368.9 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 371.7 feet on Saturday, February 15.
* Flood stage is 365.0 feet.
* The river will continue to rise through Friday, cresting around
371.7 feet on Saturday, February 15.
* At 372.0 feet...In Decatur County, at Cherokee Heights, the
entrance to parking lot to boat launch area is flooded. Main
evacuation road to Lost Creek Boat Dock and Landing closes.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued later today or when
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
